1.name: Myamsar
1.description: This agile twinsword assassin slices foes faster than the eye can follow.
1.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○△△
Combo: ○○□○
Immobilise foes and tear them apart! Never releases prey during combo! Perfect for shield-bearing foes.

2.name: Bowmunk
2.description: All-natural eco warrior alters environment to the advantage of your allies.
2.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○△△ 〜 ××△△
Combo: ××△△
The Tree of Tranquillity and the power of nature nurtures your allies and heals their HP.

3.name: Grenburr
3.description: Swinging a greatsword in both hands, this rugged unit deals destruction on the front lines.
3.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Leap up high, spin in the air, and descend on foes with a great swing of a giant weapon. Major damage!

4.name: Taterazay
4.description: The basic shield class. This well-balanced unit holds the front lines and can attack with swords.
4.skilldescription:
Activate: △△□○
Combo: △△□○
An invisible shield protects the entire team. Greatly reduces damage to team.
〜 Combines with other hero skills 〜

5.name: Destrobo
5.description: This demolition unit uses dual arm weapons. Pulverises structures and forts.
5.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Swing both arms wildly to batter and knock back foes. Effective for demolishing rock walls and towers.

6.name: Guardira
6.description: This defensive unit bears two greatshields. Relies on other units to provide offence.
6.skilldescription:
Activate: △△□○
Combo: △△□○
Summon a huge shield that protects the rear lines. 10% of damage received by shield transfers to hero.

7.name: Tondenga
7.description: This fearsome giant bears a weapon in each hand and deals devastating damage.
7.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Spin violently with weapons splayed in this dramatic centrifugal attack. Inches forward while deflecting foes.
